title: Errol Spence Jr. vs. Shawn Porter: Live round-by-round results, analysis
text:
Undefeated champion Errol Spence Jr. (25-0) looks to unify his IBF welterweight title when he meets WBC champion Shawn Porter (30-2) on Saturday at the Staples Center in Los Angeles. Follow all the main-event action here with Yahoo Sports boxing columnist Kevin Iole giving live updates from ringside.

Refresh this page for the latest updates.

Spence vs. Porter main card results

Scroll to continue with content Ad

Errol Spence Jr. vs. Shawn Porter

Anthony Dirrell vs. David Benavídez

Mario Barrios vs. Batyr Akhmedov

Josesito López def. John Molina Jr. via TKO (referee stoppage) at 0:39 of R8:

Josesito Lopez continues to absolutely punish Molina Jr.! 😳



BUY #SpencePorter NOW ➡️ https://t.co/5Hmd7crh2X pic.twitter.com/l0DcgM0dGx — FOX Sports: PBC (@PBConFOX) September 29, 2019

Josesito Lopez is bringing the HEAT tonight! 👀He drops John Molina Jr. twice in Round 1.



BUY #SpencePorter NOW ➡️ https://t.co/5Hmd7crh2X pic.twitter.com/FIB6yrsSFH — FOX Sports: PBC (@PBConFOX) September 29, 2019

description: Follow all the action from Staples Center in Los Angeles as Errol Spence Jr. meets Shawn Porter in an IBF-WBC welterweight title unification bout.
